message: Hi Bob, thanks for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9,000. It's a great price, considering the value it will bring to your business.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $9,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. It's a fair price considering the value I place on it.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8,750. It's still a great deal, considering the value you'll get from the product.
